ygData.subject: Re: Maximals Attack!/Sunhawk's return(council read)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sunhawk smiled. Sunhawk:  I asure you I will survive this.  I have my ways. A slot opened in his back silently and not noticable unless you were looking at it.

Sunhawk smiled.

Sunhawk:  I asure you I will survive this.  I have my ways.

A slot opened in his back silently and not noticable unless you were 
looking at it.  His spark returned to his chest and entered a small 
capsule ready for launch.  The capsule had small lasers capable of 
blasting out through the cealing and escaping the blast.

OOC: I know I should have submitted this first, but if the council 
thinks this breaks a rule then just tell me and I'll rewrite this 
post.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
>   So what's it going to be.  Oh and if your friend even
> > thinks about firing again I assure you I can put this charge 
right in
> > the path of his lasers and blow us all to bits anyway.
> >
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Smirking Nightshade laughed, "Hot Rod is still his old self, 
I'm not.
> Best that happens I throw your skid plate into a cell...worst your 
skid
> plate gets embedded in the commanders ready room wall one deck and 
several
> rooms beyond this one. 10 seconds left Sunhawk, can't avenge 
yourself on the
> real one that killed your mate if you're blown to itty bitty 
fragments."
> 
>     Folding her arms over over her chest, not in the least scared 
by the
> rapidly blinking charges just below her head. Her expiration would 
be easy
> at ground zero of the blast...Sunhawk would have to dael with her 
fragments
> thrown through his body at high velocity. Smirking she started 
counting
> down...quite ready to let the charges blow up in all their faces.
